Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimization where the objective function or constraints are nonlinear.
Example: Minimizing energy in a physical system

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Linear or nonlinear optimization with integer decision variables.

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Linear programming with both continuous and integer variables.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Optimization of a convex objective over convex constraints; global optimum guaranteed.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimization with quadratic objective and linear constraints.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Sequential decision-making optimization over time using recursive structure.
Example: Shortest path in a staged network

Name: Stochastic Programming
Description: Optimization under uncertainty using probabilistic constraints or objectives.
Appearances: Supply chain planning under demand uncertainty

Name: Robust Optimization
Description: Optimization under worst-case uncertainty without probability assumptions.
